🌟 *Welcome to your Personal Cosmic Coach!*

I'm here to guide you through your cosmic journey with personalized astrology insights.

📅 *What's your birth date?*

💡 *Accepted formats:*
• DDMMYY (e.g., 150690 for June 15, 1990)
• DDMMYYYY (e.g., 15061990)

*Why birth date?* Your birth chart reveals your unique cosmic blueprint!

ask_birth_time.prompt:
Great! 📅 Your birth date reveals your *Sun Sign* and core personality.

For more accurate insights, what's your birth time? (HHMM or HH:MM, 24-hour format)

*Examples:* 1430 or 14:30

💡 *Why birth time?* It determines your *Rising Sign* (how others see you) and *Moon Sign* (your emotional nature).

Or reply 'skip' if you don't know.
ask_birth_time.error_message: Please provide time in HHMM (1430) or HH:MM (14:30) format, or 'skip'

ask_birth_place.prompt:
Excellent! 🌍 Birth place determines your *local planetary positions* at birth.

Please provide your birth city and country:

*Example:* Mumbai, India

💡 *Why birth place?* Different locations have unique astrological influences due to latitude/longitude.
